rule.description: Engine RPM at time of alert

rule.name: description
enum: Power Unit Overheating  Engine temperature exceeds safe limits
ERS Malfunction  Energy recovery system is not delivering expected power output
Oil Pressure Drop  Critical oil pressure loss detected
Gearbox Sync Issue  Delayed or failed gear shifts detected
Brake Temperature Critical  Front/rear brake temps too high
Fuel Pressure Instability  Inconsistent fuel delivery detected
Hydraulic System Failure  Loss of hydraulic pressure affecting steering and shifting
Sensor Calibration Error  Inconsistent readings from tire pressure or aero sensors
Differential Slippage Detected  Unusual rear-wheel slip
Wheel Speed Sensor Failure  Inaccurate wheel speed data

carID.description: Unique identifier for the F1 car

rule.name: carID
rule.description: Unique identifier for the F1 car

recommendedAction.description: Recommended action to address the alert

rule.name: recommendedAction
enum: Adjust differential settings on the steering wheel
